statements: SELECT * FROM device_health_metrics ORDER BY device_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT cpu_usage, memory_usage, storage_usage FROM device_health_metrics WHERE device_id = 5 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage, network_traffic FROM device_health_metrics WHERE memory_usage > 80 AND network_traffic BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM device_health_metrics WHERE security_monitoring = TRUE AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage, storage_usage FROM device_health_metrics WHERE cpu_usage < 50 AND storage_usage > 60 ORDER BY device_id ASC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM device_health_metrics WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM device_health_metrics WHERE memory_usage > 50
SELECT device_id, timestamp, network_traffic FROM device_health_metrics WHERE network_traffic < 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage, storage_usage FROM device_health_metrics WHERE storage_usage BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT AVG(cpu_usage), MAX(memory_usage), MIN(storage_usage) FROM device_health_metrics
SELECT * FROM device_health_metrics;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM device_health_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM device_health_metrics WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT device_id, status FROM device_health_metrics WHERE status='OK';
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature FROM device_health_metrics WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_health_metrics WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage FROM performance_data GROUP BY device_id
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM device_health_metrics WHERE status = 'active' LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(cpu_usage) AS max_cpu, MIN(memory_usage) AS min_memory FROM performance_data
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM device_health_metrics GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_temp > 25
SELECT * FROM device_health_metrics;
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM device_health_metrics WHERE cpu_usage > 50;
SELECT timestamp, disk_usage FROM device_health_metrics WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, security_score FROM security_data WHERE security_alert = true;
SELECT device_id, network_speed, memory_size FROM performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, cpu_usage FROM device_health_metrics;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, memory_usage, disk_usage FROM device_health_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, network_speed, cpu_temp FROM performance_data WHERE network_speed > 100 ORDER BY network_speed DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, security_alert FROM security_data WHERE security_alert = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, security_score FROM security_data WHERE security_score > 0.8 AND device_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM DeviceMetrics;
SELECT device_id, pressure, humidity FROM DeviceMetrics WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT * FROM SecurityMonitoring;
SELECT device_id, memory_usage, storage_usage FROM PerformanceData WHERE cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature FROM DeviceMetrics;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM PerformanceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature), MIN(pressure) FROM DeviceMetrics GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%critical%' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, event_timestamp, event_type, event_description FROM SecurityMonitoring WHERE event_type = 'security' LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM health_metrics WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_id, maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_log WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description, event_date FROM security_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE firmware_version = '1.2.3';
SELECT * FROM health_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM health_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Heart Rate';
SELECT device_id, metric_name, timestamp FROM health_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, location, firmware_version FROM device_info WHERE location = 'Hospital';
